#summary Use Cases

This is just a list of Use Cases we should have

  * Signing up at the site
  * User wants to add artist to be alerted about
  * Adding artists through Uploading Application
  * Adding artists manually through the website
  * User wants to purchase an album
  * User is notified of a new information
  * User can share and receive recommendations
  * User can set account preferences
  * User wants to rate a new album they purchased
  * User can see an overview of his collection
  * User can see statistics of what's popular with other users
